author: Kat D.
text:
I was kept on a chat for one hour to try to get a full refund, including shipping and handling both ways, for earrings that had  a defective clasp. The company should have immediately agreed to pay for the shipping.

Instead, they offered a credit for the shipping. I contacted them within one hour of getting the earrings, and wasted an entire hour. They finally made it right, but I have a bad taste about how they treat customers when their quality control is bad. 

The earrings are up for sale again one day after they received them back. Did they fix them that fast? Doubtful…
title: Poor customer service when item was defective

author: customer
text: I recently ordered six pairs of shoes from The RealReal. These are all from designers I currently own. Some of the shoes are exactly as described. Two pairs however are not. Both of these pairs although my size, are so completely tiny and narrow that I cannot fit them on my foot. These are both designers I own and wear. There may be something wrong with the manufacturing on these specific pairs, but I feel that the fact that they are unnaturally narrow and small to the point that they cannot even be put on, should have been mentioned in the description. Instead it just says this designer fits a 1/2 size small, which I already am aware of and in this case is not at all accurate.

author: Customer
text:
My husband bought 2 items from them, and I bought a bag. It seems their condition rating is arbitrary. The item I bought was supposedly in "excellent" condition but came with nicks and scratches that are unresolvable. The bag was also slightly deformed. The items my husband bought were both described as in very good condition but came in different degrees of wear as well.

But the shipping was fast. Too many items there though that are unreturnable so pay attention to that. Also, and this is not on TRR, but buyers in Canada should look up duties and taxes when calculating the total cost of goods. Can be a shocker.
title: Condition Rating is iffy at best
